title: Synthesis of Hybrid Perovskite Nanocrystals
author: Opentrons
description:
This protocol performs preparation for the synthesis of hybrid perovskite nanocrystals on a 360ul flat Corning plate..



Corning 96-flat well microplate 360ul
Opentrons 4x6 1.5ml Eppendorf safelock snapcap tuberack
P50 Single-channel electronic pipette
P300 Single-channel electronic pipette
Opentrons 300ul tiprack



4x6 1.5ml Eppendorf safelock snapcap tuberack (slot 5)
 A1: CSPBI3
 A2: MAPBBR3
 A3: FAPBI3
 B1-B5: chloroform
process:
Input the mount side for your single-channel pipettes.
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support articles.
Hit "Run".
notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the Troubleshooting Survey.

markdown.title: Synthesis of Hybrid Perovskite Nanocrystals
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
This protocol performs preparation for the synthesis of hybrid perovskite nanocrystals on a 360ul flat Corning plate..

---
![Materials Needed](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/001-General+Headings/materials.png)

* [Corning 96-flat well microplate 360ul](https://ecatalog.corning.com/life-sciences/b2c/US/en/Microplates/Assay-Microplates/96-Well-Microplates/Corning%C2%AE-96-well-Solid-Black-and-White-Polystyrene-Microplates/p/corning96WellSolidBlackAndWhitePolystyreneMicroplates)
* [Opentrons 4x6 1.5ml Eppendorf safelock snapcap tuberack](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/verified-labware/products/tube-rack-set-1)
* [P50 Single-channel electronic pipette](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-pipettes/products/single-channel-electronic-pipette?variant=5984549077021)
* [P300 Single-channel electronic pipette](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-pipettes/products/single-channel-electronic-pipette?variant=5984549077021)
* [Opentrons 300ul tiprack](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips/products/opentrons-300ul-tips)

---
![Setup](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/001-General+Headings/Setup.png)

4x6 1.5ml Eppendorf safelock snapcap tuberack (slot 5)
* A1: CSPBI3
* A2: MAPBBR3
* A3: FAPBI3
* B1-B5: chloroform
markdown.process:
1. Input the mount side for your single-channel pipettes.
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support articles](https://support.opentrons.com/en/collections/1559720-guide-for-getting-started-with-the-ot-2).
6. Hit "Run".
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the [Troubleshooting Survey](https://protocol-troubleshooting.paperform.co/).
